mapper.update: update TRAIN_INFO set TRAIN_NO = #{trainNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, START_STATION = #{startStation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ARRIVAL_STATION = #{arrivalStation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, START_TIME = #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ARRIVAL_TIME = #{arrivalTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `TYPE` = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RUNTIME = #{runtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MILE = #{mile,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where TRAIN_ID = #{trainId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select TRAIN_ID, TRAIN_NO, START_STATION, ARRIVAL_STATION, START_TIME, ARRIVAL_TIME, `TYPE`, RUNTIME, MILE from TRAIN_INFO where TRAIN_ID = #{trainId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select TRAIN_ID, TRAIN_NO, START_STATION, ARRIVAL_STATION, START_TIME, ARRIVAL_TIME, `TYPE`, RUNTIME, MILE from TRAIN_INFO
